byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and TRIP GABRIEL

abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton seizes on Republican Donald J Trump's attacks on his rival Ted Cruz's wife, using Trump's own words to portray him as unabashed misogynist; suburban and independent females will play outsize role in deciding 2016 presidential election, and Democrats are highlighting how Trump has repeatedly dismissed and offended women.
lead_paragraph: Donald Trump’s nasty skirmish with Ted Cruz about Mr. Cruz’s wife, Heidi, has played into a Democratic strategy to defeat Mr. Trump in November: to portray him as an unabashed sexist.

headline.main: Democrats See Gains as Donald Trump Targets a Wife
headline.print_headline: Democrats See Gains as Trump Targets a Wife

snippet: Donald Trump’s nasty skirmish with Ted Cruz about Mr. Cruz’s wife, Heidi, has played into a Democratic strategy to defeat Mr. Trump in November: to portray him as an unabashed sexist.
